## Purchase of Optical Telemetry and Measuring Wheelset Systems

### Tender Details

- **Reference Number**: cb-488-68906510 (rev. 1)
- **Solicitation Number**: 24-58009
- **Publication Date**: April 12, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: April 29, 2024, 2:00 PM (EDT)
- **Amendment Date**: April 29, 2024
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 2, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: September 20, 2024

### Tender Description

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) seeks a supplier for an optical telemetry system and a measuring wheelset computer (MWSC) system that is compatible with existing PROSE systems. The successful bidder must provide the required solutions, meeting the NRC’s technical and quality standards.

### Terms and Conditions

- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method**: Advance Contract Award Notice
- **Trade Agreements**: The NRC recognizes the following trade agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and North American Free Trade Agreement, among others.
- **Geographic Location**: The contract will be awarded to a supplier located in Canada, with delivery to various regions across Europe.

### Contact Information

- **Contracting Authority**: National Research Council, Carol Cooper, at carol.cooper@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca or (902) 293-8053.
- **Notice URL**: Not applicable; however, additional information is available on the Government of Canada’s procurement website.

### Attachments

- English Tender Notice: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35917/24-580009-acan_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35917/24-580009-acan_en.pdf)
